statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | xargs basename); git_branch=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); git_status=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l || echo '0'); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[34mgit:(%s)\033[0m" "$model" "$current_dir" "$git_branch"; [ "$git_status" -gt 0 ] && printf " \033[33m✗\033[0m" || printf " \033[32m✓\033[0m"
